metaface.client
Class MetaFaceHTTPClient

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      metaface.client.MetaFaceClient
          metaface.client.MetaFaceHTTPClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, HTTPListener, Runnable
public class MetaFaceHTTPClient
extends MetaFaceClient
implements HTTPListener, Runnable

This class allows communication with a MetaFace framework server via HTTP.

Traditional HTTP communication follows these steps:

  • 1. Client sends a request to the HTTP Server
  • 2. The HTTP server retrieves the HTML data
  • 3. The HTTP server then sends the data in response
    •

    User stimulus is sent to the HTTP MetaFace server via multplexing and MetaFace framework headers

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Simon Beard

    MetaFaceHTTPClient

    public MetaFaceHTTPClient(DigitalSignalProcessor dsp,
                          DrawingArea drawingarea,
                          netscape.javascript.JSObject win,
                          String url,
                          IdleBehaviour ib)
    Constructor for the MetaFaceHTTPClient object

    Parameters:
    dsp - The TTS DSP to be used by the client in synthesising speech audio
    drawingarea - The MPEG-4 face rendering panel
    win - The JSObject window used to access the web browser
    url - The URL of the HTTP MetaFace server
    ib - The idle time behaviour to be used
